name: Kenney UI Pack (button samples)
license: CC0 (Kenney) use UI Pack icons for undo/hint/shuffle/restart/pause/play/sound-on/sound-off

name: Kenney Game Icons (icons for cards)

name: # Notes: Download the Kenney packs (UI Pack / Game Icons / Mobile Controls) from kenney.nl or kenney.itch.io; extract desired PNGs
type: then convert to WebP and generate @2x versions using imagemagick. For Mixkit sounds visit the links and download MP3/WAV files and convert to 44.1kHz 128kbps using ffmpeg if necessary.
